column1: 1617,Wolverine (2003) #25,25,1935,285,"""ENEMY OF THE STATE"" Conclusion!  Tough love takes on a whole new meaning when Wolverine, brainwashed and evil, comes home to the X-Mansion for his most damaging Hydra mission yet. Are the X-Men and Nick Fury ready for him? The blistering storyline speeds to a breakneck conclusion you have to see to believe!",
